description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nSurprise Treat:
After your creatures receive a debuff, their on-buff effects activate. If you have a {RACE_Dumpling} or {RACE_Mimic} creature fighting on your side, this effect repeats 1 additional time. This trait does not stack.
name: Rotten Dough
